title.rendered: The Beljanski Foundation, Top Cancer Research Institute, to Host Skin Cancer Prevention Webinar May 9, 2023

content.rendered:
Sylvie Beljanski

Winning The War On Cancer

Stephen Heuer

Meet Sylvie Beljanski and Stephen Heuer at the exclusive online event and learn more about how to protect against skin cancer.

LOS ANGELES, UNITED STATES, May 3, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The Beljanski Foundation, a top cancer research organization, will host a Virtual Healthy Tuesdays webinar that focuses on how to protect against skin cancer. The event begins at 7 PM and lasts until 8:30 PM (EST) via Zoom on May 9, 2023. Keynote speakers for the event are award-winning author Sylvie Beljanski and nutrition expert Stephen Heuer. 100% of the event proceeds will be donated to The Beljanski Foundation, a 501 (c)(3) non-profit organization, to help fund anticancer research to cure cancer the natural way.

There are many types of skin cancer, some rarely lethal, such as basal cell and squamous cell carcinoma (but the surgical treatment is painful and often disfiguring), and some much more deadly, like melanoma, that it can metastasize or spread throughout the body. It is expected that, in the years to come, the decrease in ozone levels will result in thousands of additional non-melanoma and melanoma skin cancer cases.

Virtual Healthy Tuesdays live webinar will offer many benefits, including live presentations by Sylvie Beljanski and Stephen Heuer, question-and-answer sessions with the keynote speakers, and some valuable giveaways. Since 1990, Stephen Heuer has worked as a private nutritional consultant and holds a Bachelor of Science as a Nutripath. Sylvie Beljanski is an entrepreneur, public speaker, award-winning author, and proponent of natural medicine. She is the founder of The Beljanski Foundation and the CEO of Maison Beljanski, an international nutritional supplement company.

Stephen Heuer and Sylvie Beljanski will speak of what causes cancer, as well as the importance of a nutritional approach to help support the body’s natural repair systems. Sylvie Beljanski will present the latest scientific publications resulting from The Beljanski Foundation’s research program on Melanoma. Indeed, some green tea extracts have shown superior activity at inhibiting the development of melanoma cancer cells, while a specific golden leaf ginkgo extract has shown the ability to inhibit angiogenin, limiting the ability to spread.

During the event, participants will also learn about the worst offenders that alter their skin over time, how to nourish skin from the inside, what sunscreen to choose, how to fight skin fibrosis, and about non-toxic skincare options. The cost of the event is $5.

“The Beljanski Foundation’s overall mission is to study and share knowledge of effective, non-toxic natural answers that work both alone and in synergy with traditional Western medicine to cure cancer and other chronic diseases the natural way. Angiogenin is a very interesting target for the treatment of cancer. The golden ginkgo extract has already been studied for its ability to fight skin fibrosis, but the new publication marks a major advancement in the fight against melanoma,” explains Sylvie Beljanski.

To learn more about the Beljanski Foundation, and support its research programs, click here: https://www.beljanski.org/

To register for the webinar, visit: https://crm.maisonbeljanski.com/event/how-to-protect-yourself-from-skin-cancer-05-09-2023-19-00-us-eastern-320/register

Aurora DeRose
Boundless Media Inc.
+1 951-870-0099
email us here

You just read:

News Provided By

May 03, 2023, 21:27 GMT
